name: multikey-strapi-template
description: Multikey Strapi Template powered by NikolasMelui and RinatDav for Multikey Studio.
author: nikolasmelui <slak@samaradom.ru

scripts.install: (cd server && npm install) && (cd client && npm install)
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build"  "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.start: (cd server && npm run start:pm2) && (cd client && npm run start:pm2)
scripts.restart: (cd server && npm run restart:pm2) && (cd client && npm run restart:pm2)
scripts.stop: (cd server && npm run stop:pm2) && (cd client && npm run stop:pm2)
